document.masterDocTitle: The large carrion beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Turkey: a review with a new species record

, D. Çiftçi leg. (MAZMGU).

Remarks. Widely distributed Palaearctic species, known from central and southern Europe to the west of China (Růžička 2015). Reported from grassland habitats with chernozem soils in central Europe ( Jakubec & Růžička 2012 , 2015 ) and from xerophilous habitats in southern Russia ( Pushkin 2015 ). This species has many records from all regions of Turkey except for the Black Sea and Marmara Regions ( Fig. 25 ). Here we provide the first records from Mersin , Sivas and Siirt Provinces.
